title: The Handyman
description: “I will savor every part of your body; every nook and every cranny. I will make you feel like my last meal. And I will do it with your husband in the next room.” Sofia’s breathing became ragged. She held the stupid cookbook to her chest like a lifesaver, but she couldn't stop her heart bashing against it. And Vaughn? His hand had somehow slipped up the hem of her dress…
author: Kimber  Lee
